name: Cursed Dice Dungeon
description:
ROLL OF THE DICE

You have to reach the door before hearing the roll of the dice

Everytime you hear it you will get a curse and in the end you will die

Before that happens reach the door.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Space - Jump

MouseWheel - Zoom in/out

Left Click - Fast Attack

Right Click - Special Attack

CREDITS

Ahmet Yusuf Söylemezoğlu - Programmer, Level Design

3D Models - Quaternius • Free Game Assets

SFX - FreeSound & OpenGameArt

VFX - Unreal Marketplace
